00015 package citation.output;
00016 
00017 import java.rmi.RemoteException;
00018 
00019 import javax.xml.rpc.JAXRPCException;
00020 
00021 import net.rim.device.api.system.RadioInfo;
00022 import citation.comm.CitationCatcher_Stub;
00023 import citation.data.Citation;
00024 import citation.print.Printer;
00025 import citation.print.PrinterException;
00026 
00027 
00034 public class CitationOutput {
00035 
00036     public CitationOutput(){}
00037 
00038     
00043     public void printCitation(Object _record) {
00044            if (!(_record instanceof Citation))
00045                 return;
00046 
00047            try {
00048               Printer printer = new Printer();
00049               printer.print((Citation) _record);
00050            } catch (PrinterException e) {
00051               e.printStackTrace();
00052            }
00053     }
00054 
00055     
00062     public void submitCitation(Object _record) 
00063     {
00064         int result = -1;
00065         
00066         // guard conditions - make sure _record is Citation 
00067         if (!(_record instanceof Citation)) {
00068             return;
00069         }
00070         
00071                 // make sure that there is at least one active data service network
00072                 if (!RadioInfo.isDataServiceOperational()) {
00073                         return;                 
00074                 }
00075 
00076         Citation c = (Citation) _record;
00077 
00078         CitationCatcher_Stub serverObj = new CitationCatcher_Stub();
00079 
00080         try {
00081             // send it off to the server
00082             result = serverObj.postCitationAsXML(c.toXMLString());
00083         }
00084         catch (JAXRPCException e) {
00085                 result = -1;
00086         }
00087         catch (RemoteException e) {
00088             result = -1;
00089         }
00090 
00091         // successfully sent - flag the citation as already submitted
00092         if (0 == result) {
00093             c.setSubmitted(true);
00094         }
00095     }
00096 
00097 }
